text: SAP is hiring over 100 developers worldwide for the HANA DBaaS which will be available on multiple IaaS Platforms, cementing the foundation for future innovations in the cloud space. Jobs are in Palo Alto, San Ramon, Berlin, Walldorf, Ho Chi Minh, Seoul, Vancouver, Waterloo and Pune. View jobs and apply on our corporate career site here: https://jobs.sap.com/search/?q=SAPhanacareers&locationsearch...
